content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-230-01-A
|Item_parent=Acute chest pain
|Item_parent_short=Acute chest pain
|Rank=A
|Title=Know the definition of acute chest pain
|Description=None
|Rubric=Definition
|Contributors=Vincent Roule
|Order=1}}
'''Know the definition of acute chest pain'''

<nowiki/>= pain (or discomfort) in the region of the rib cage (between the neck and the umbilicus) occurring suddenly.

Variable characteristics: intensity, location, irradiation, duration, triggering or relieving factor, frequency.

question.question: What is the primary characteristic of acute chest pain?
question.option_a: A. The pain is usually felt in the left side of the chest.
question.option_b: B. The pain is usually felt in the right side of the chest.
question.option_c: C. The pain is usually felt in the front of the chest.
question.option_d: D. The pain is usually felt in the back of the chest.
